analyzed: tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: nor is he undifferentiated.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang thar pa dang tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang thar pa dang tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Likewise, the Tathāgata is also not different from liberation,

original: tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin pas /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin pas /
translated: nor is he undifferentiated.

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni thar pa'i ming gis bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni thar pa'i ming gis bstan to //
translated: Thus, the Tathāgata is taught by the name of liberation.

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dang thar pa tha dad na ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid las mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dang thar pa tha dad na ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid las mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: If the Tathāgata and liberation were different, he would be established from the characteristics of form.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid las mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid las mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is established from the characteristics of form, it would be impermanent.

original: ci ste tha mi dad na ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thob pa'i mtshan nyid bye brag med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste tha mi dad na ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thob pa'i mtshan nyid bye brag med par 'gyur te /
translated: If it is not different, the characteristics obtained by the yogis would be undifferentiated.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bye brag kyang mthong bas na de'i phyir tha dad pa'ang ma yin /🔽tha @422a *// mi dad pa'ang ma yin no //🔽de bzhin du shes pa dang / shes bya'ang tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bye brag kyang mthong bas na de'i phyir tha dad pa'ang ma yin / tha @422a *// mi dad pa'ang ma yin no // de bzhin du shes pa dang / shes bya'ang tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Since the yogis also see differentiation, therefore it is neither different nor undifferentiated.

original: tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, the knower and the known are neither different nor undifferentiated.

original: blo gros chen po /🔽shes pa dang / shes bya tha dad pa'ang ma yin /🔽tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin pa ni rtag pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: blo gros chen po / shes pa dang / shes bya tha dad pa'ang ma yin / tha mi dad pa'ang ma yin pa ni rtag pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Mañjuśrī,🔽the knower and the known are neither different nor undifferentiated.

original: mi rtag pa'ang ma yin /🔽byed pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'ang ma yin / byed pa'ang ma yin /
translated: They are neither permanent nor impermanent.

original: byas pa'ang ma yin /🔽'dus byas kyang ma yin /
analyzed: byas pa'ang ma yin / 'dus byas kyang ma yin /
translated: They are neither creators nor created.

original: 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin /🔽blo'ang ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin / blo'ang ma yin /
translated: They are neither conditioned nor unconditioned.

original: rig par bya ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rig par bya ba'ang ma yin /
translated: They are neither the mind nor what is to be known.

original: mtshan nyid kyang ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyang ma yin /
translated: They are neither characteristics nor the basis of characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'ang ma yin /🔽phung po rnams kyang ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'ang ma yin / phung po rnams kyang ma yin /
translated: It is not a basis of characteristics.🔽It is not the aggregates.

original: phung po rnams tha dad pa'ang ma yin /🔽bshad pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: phung po rnams tha dad pa'ang ma yin / bshad pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not a separate entity from the aggregates.🔽It is not an explanation.

original: bshad par bya ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: bshad par bya ba'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not what is to be explained.

original: gcig pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gcig pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not one.

original: tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not different.

original: gnyis ka'ang ma yin /
analyzed: gnyis ka'ang ma yin /
translated: It is not both.

original: gnyis ka ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma thams cad dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma thams cad dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is not neither. Therefore, it is free from all valid cognitions.

original: gang tshad ma thams cad dang bral ba de ni tshig med pa'o //
analyzed: gang tshad ma thams cad dang bral ba de ni tshig med pa'o //
translated: That which is free from all valid cognitions is beyond words.

original: gang tshig med pa de ni skyes ba'o //
analyzed: gang tshig med pa de ni skyes ba'o //
translated: That which is beyond words is unborn.

original: gang ma skyes pa de ni ma 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: gang ma skyes pa de ni ma 'gags pa'o //
translated: That which is unborn is unceasing.

original: gang ma 'gags pa de ni rab tu zhi ba'o //
analyzed: gang ma 'gags pa de ni rab tu zhi ba'o //
translated: That which is unceasing is thoroughly peaceful.

original: gang rab tu zhi ba de ni rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gang rab tu zhi ba de ni rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: That which is thoroughly peaceful is naturally in a state of nirvāṇa.

original: gang rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa de ni dngos po dang rgyu med pa'o //
analyzed: gang rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa de ni dngos po dang rgyu med pa'o //
translated: That which is naturally in a state of nirvāṇa is devoid of entities and causes.

original: gang dngos po dang rgyu med pa de ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang dngos po dang rgyu med pa de ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
translated: That which is devoid of entities and causes is beyond reference.

original: gang dmigs @422b pa med pa de ni spros pa thams cad las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gang dmigs @422b pa med pa de ni spros pa thams cad las 'das pa'o //
translated: That which is not an object is beyond all conceptual elaboration.

original: gang spros pa thams cad las 'das pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: gang spros pa thams cad las 'das pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: That which is beyond all conceptual elaboration is the Tathāgata.
